headlines.description: Harry Kane scored on his Tottenham return, but the London side's Premier League title hopes suffered a major setback as they lost 2-1 at Burnley.

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlights(Burnley 2-1 Tottenham: Clarets shock Spurs) 2019/02/23 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Kane strikes, but Spurs beaten at Burnley

headlines.description: Joshua King scored one penalty and missed another as Bournemouth drew 1-1 on Saturday with Wolverhampton Wanderers, who also netted from the spot.

video.headline: Bournemouth 1-1 Wolves: King misses late penalty

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlights (Bournemouth 1-1 Wolves King misses late penalty) 2019/02/23 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Jimenez seals Wolves draw in 3-penalty match

headlines.description: Newcastle's 2-0 win over 10-man Huddersfield eased their Premier League safety fears and sent the Terriers hurtling ever faster toward relegation.

video.headline: Newcastle 2-0 Huddersfield: Almiron impactful in first start

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Newcastle 2-0 Huddersfield: Almiron impactful in first start) 2019/02/23 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle send Huddersfield closer to relegation

headlines.description: Crystal Palace piled further pressure on Leicester City manager Claude Puel on Saturday with a comprehensive 4-1 Premier League win over his team.

video.headline: Leicester City 1-4 Crystal Palace: Zaha finds his scoring boots

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlights (Leicester City 1-4 Crystal Palace: Zaha finds his scoring boots) 2019/02/23 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Palace rout Leicester to step up pressure on Puel
